column5: I purchesed a pack of the worms off Jose and theres a pack with a name called "special order" There is some numbers to identify the color, does anyone know where I can go and order this type of color,or is there a way i can create my own from a color chart???
was it the red looking one?  I sometimes get a few special order bags red ones and a few watermelon colour ones as well
Monster Bait has a special Senko that is sort of a grey colour with gold flakes.  It's supposed to be Shad pattern. You can find them on their web site.
Min 1500 packs for any custom color
1500 packs? Thats crazy!! or 150 packs? what the website anyways
